Čorny Byseł: a name recognized, not announced. His work is initiation, not decoration. To inquire is to seek passage— not all doors open. If you know the way, proceed.

About
- the creator

A name whispered among those who recognize significance. “Black Stork”—a symbol of rare grace and silent mastery.

Behind this veil stands Victor Selin, though only a few will ever need to know this name.

Boutique: enter
the golden mystery

The luxury boutique is a sanctuary of elegance and refinement, where every detail is curated to inspire and enchant. Here, exquisite craftsmanship meets timeless design, offering a collection of rare and sophisticated pieces.
